sentences.en: ...a model railway.
sentences.cn: …一个铁路模型。

sentences.en: a top fashion model
sentences.cn: 顶级时装模特

sentences.en: a working model (= one with parts which move ) of a steam engine
sentences.cn: 蒸汽机车的活动模型

sentences.en: Claire modelled for a few years when she was in her twenties.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔在二十几岁时做过几年模特。

sentences.en: He became a model of clean living and Bible Belt virtues.
sentences.cn: 他成了洁身自好、恪守“圣经地带”德行的典范。

sentences.en: He is a model professional and an example to the younger lads.
sentences.cn: 他是个模范的专业人士，是年轻人的榜样。

sentences.en: He was described by his seniors as a model officer.
sentences.cn: 上司们形容他是个模范官员。

sentences.en: He was the very model of the dashing RAF pilot.
sentences.cn: 他正是风度翩翩的英国皇家空军飞行员的典范。

sentences.en: His marriage and family life is a model of propriety.
sentences.cn: 他的婚姻和家庭生活都是规规矩矩的。

sentences.en: Many of the resulting wines lack the subtlety of the original model.
sentences.cn: 许多如此酿制的葡萄酒都不像最初的葡萄酒那样耐人品味。

sentences.en: No model can ever be a perfect an-alogue of nature itself.
sentences.cn: 任何模型都无法完全模拟自然本身。

sentences.en: Our dishwasher is the latest model (= newest design ) .
sentences.cn: 我们的洗碗机是最新的型号。

sentences.en: She’s modeling Donna Karan’s fall collection.
sentences.cn: 她在为唐娜•凯兰的秋装系列当模特。

sentences.en: Simon Lane quickly found his niche as a busy freelance model maker.
sentences.cn: 西蒙·莱恩很快找到了适合自己的位置，成了一名忙碌的模型制作的自由职业者。

sentences.en: That model won't go into production before late 1990.
sentences.cn: 那种型号在20世纪90年代末以前不会批量生产。

sentences.en: The grand piano has been replaced with a small, inelegant electric model.
sentences.cn: 三角钢琴被代之以一架粗鄙的小电子琴。

sentences.en: The non-drinking, non smoking model should do nothing to risk her reputation.
sentences.cn: 那名烟酒不沾的模特儿不应做任何对自己名声不利的事情。

sentences.en: The object of her hatred was 24-year-old model Ros French.
sentences.cn: 令她心头生恨的是24岁的模特罗斯·弗伦奇。

sentences.en: This basic utilitarian model gives a relatively unsophisticated account of human behaviour.
sentences.cn: 这个实用的基础模型较为简略地解释了人类的行为。

sentences.en: This model allows you to spellcheck over 100,000 different words.
sentences.cn: 用这个型号可以检查逾10万个词的拼写。

sentences.en: To keep the cost down, opt for a basic model.
sentences.cn: 要想花钱少些，就选择基本的型号。

words.tran_cn: 塑造者；制造模型者（model的名词形式）
模化；立体感；模特儿职业（等于modeling）

phrases.tran_cn: 商业模式；经营模式；业务模式
有限元模式，有限元模型；有限单元体模式；有限要素模型
n. 数值模式，数值模型
实用新型（约十个国家法律承认的一种保护发明名称，期限五年）

trans.tran_en: a small copy of a building, vehicle, machine etc, especially one that can be put together from separate parts
to be designed in a way that copies another system or way of doing something
to wear clothes at a fashion show or in magazine photographs in order to show them to people

trans.tran_cn: 模仿，制作模型，塑造，将…做成模型
trans.tran_en: to be designed in a way that copies another system or way of doing something
